mapper.insert: insert bora_book (id, bk_year, bk_month, bk_budget) values(#{id}, #{bk_year}, #{bk_month}, #{bk_budget})
mapper.update: update bora_book where id=#{loginID} and bk_year=#{bk_year} and bk_month=#{bk_month}
mapper.select: select count(*) from bora_book where id=#{id}
select count(*) from bora_book where bk_year=#{bk_year}, bk_month=#{bk_month}

select b.bk_num, b.id, b.bk_year, b.bk_month, b.bk_budget, d.bk_detail_num, d.bk_day, d.bk_iow, d.bk_group, d.bk_category, d.bk_money, d.bk_memo from bora_book b join bora_book_detail d on b.bk_num = d.bk_num where b.id=#{loginID} order by b.bk_num desc, d.bk_detail_num desc
select * from bora_book b join bora_book_detail d on b.bk_num = d.bk_num where b.id=#{id} order by b.bk_num desc
select * from bora_book b join bora_detail_book where bk_year=#{bk_year} and bk_month=#{bk_month} and id=#{id} order by bk_num desc
